# Playing with Sam's LTMR Package

## Load required packages

```{r}
library(tidyr)
require(LTMRdata)
```

## Load required data

```{r}
data(Suisun)
str(Suisun)

data(FMWT)
str(FMWT)

data(Baystudy)
data(Baystudy_measured_lengths)
str(Baystudy)
```

## Generated integrated dataset

```{r}
Data <- LTMRpilot(convert_lengths=TRUE, remove_unconverted_lengths=TRUE, size_cutoff=40)
str(Data)

```
